remarks: The total number of closed walks in a finite undirected simple graph is the sum of the numbers of closed walks starting at each of its vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2018.)

numclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) $.
numclwwlk4 $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ V e. Fin /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( # ` ( C ` N ) ) = sum_ x e. V ( # ` ( x F N ) ) ) $.
